item.title: The Most Read Books on Goodreads This Week
item.description: Here are the five most-read books on Goodreads this week! These are the buzziest books of the moment, from romance to thrillers.

item.title: What are You Reading in November?
item.description: What did you read in October? What's on your TBR for November? And which 2025 Read Harder Challenge tasks did you complete? Let's chat!

item.title: Get Kids Performing, Cooking, Crafting, and More with These Active Nonfiction Books
item.description: These books will get young readers excited to cook, build, experiment, and more.

item.title: Rutherford County Library System (TN) Temporarily Shuts Down to Ban Books
item.description: Rutherford County Library System announced on social media a surprise shutdown of two libraries. Why? "Reviewing inventory."
